thread.title: Onsite Computer Webinar Examines the True Cost of Using End-of-Life Business Software
thread.title_full: Onsite Computer Webinar Examines the True Cost of Using End-of-Life Business Software - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Onsite Computer Webinar Examines the True Cost of Using End-of-Life Business Software
text:
Complimentary live event for businesses throughout Dallas-Fort Worth area scheduled for September 25.
DALLAS-FORT WORTH, Texas
Onsite Computer, a managed service provider (MSP) dedicated to providing state-of-the-art IT support, services and products for businesses throughout the Dallas-Fort Worth area, today announced that the company is delivering another complimentary webinar for existing clients and prospects. The live presentation, entitled “The True Cost of Using End-of-Life Software,” begins at noon local time on Friday, September 25, 2015. The focus of the webinar is to warn both small and medium-sized businesses about the dangers of continued use of outdated business software, such as operating systems like Windows XP and Windows Server 2003.
“Using unsupported software is a risk that businesses should not want to take,” said Jeffery Sneed, CEO, Onsite Computer. “However, while nearly every small business thinks it’s important to keep software updated, many of them, for example, are still using Server 2003 beyond its end-of-support date. The costs of this continued use can be harmful for a small business.”
Onsite Computer’s webinar takes a look at the costs of using outdated business software, the most common outdated business software being used, and the risks being taken by businesses using outdated software. Most at risk is vital business data and information, as well as businesses becoming non-compliant.
To sign up for the complimentary webinar “The True Cost of Using End-of-Life Software” scheduled for September 25, 2015, please visit https://ocrdfw.com/events/ . Or call 817.886.2687.
About Onsite Computer
Onsite Computer is a Grand Prairie, Texas-based managed IT service provider (MSP) that offers IT support and business solutions to local businesses and residents throughout the greater Dallas-Fort Worth area. Some of the company’s most popular network solutions include IT consulting, vendor management, email solutions, cloud services, security assessment, web services and remote data backup. For residential clients, the firm delivers upgrades for laptops and PCs, virus and spyware detection and removal, custom-built PCs, preventative maintenance services, password removal, software installation, data backup and recovery, remote support and data backup. Onsite Computer provides managed IT services for a variety of industries, including non-profit, education and medical. For more information about Onsite Computer and its IT support solutions, visit the company on the web at https://ocrdfw.com/ . To learn more now, call 817.886.2687. Also, to get the latest industry news and trends, go to https://ocrdfw.com/blog/ .
